                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
A secret service agent, Jennifer Marsh, gets caught in a very personal and 
deadly cat-and-mouse game with a serial killer who knows that people (being what 
they are - both curious and drawn to the dark side of things) will log onto an 
"untraceable" website where he conducts violent and painful murders LIVE on the 
net. The more people who log on and enter the website, the quicker and more 
violently the victim dies.

Director: Gregory Hoblit

writers : Robert Fyvolent
        : Mark Brinker

Cast:

Diane Lane ...  Agent Jennifer Marsh 
Billy Burke ...  Detective Eric Box 
Colin Hanks ...  Agent Griffin Dowd 
Joseph Cross ...  Owen Reilly 
Mary Beth Hurt ...  Stella Marsh 
Peter Lewis ...  Richard Brooks 
Tyrone Giordano ...  Tim Wilks

Jesse Tyler Ferguson ...  Arthur James Elmer 
Trina Adams ...  Female Cop #3 
Brynn Baron ...  Mrs. Miller 
John Breen ...  Richard Weymouth 
Dan Callahan ...  Trey Restom - Spoiled Preppie 

Enjoy the movie.
